programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep13
programme.desc: Mengisahkan berlakulah pertembungan antara Farel, Mat dan Dawami. Ternyata Mat bukan tandingan Farel. Mat tewas. Farel bertempur pula dengan Dawami. Dawami berjaya menewaskan Farel. Atas nasihat Dawami, Halim keluar dari rumah itu seisi keluarga dan balik ke rumah ibunya. Tetapi sebaik sampai sahaja di kampung ibunya, Halim menemui ibunya yang sudah meninggal dunia lama di katil dengan memeluk bingkai gambarnya. Halim jadi serba salah kerana mengabaikan ibunya selama itu hingga membawanya pada tekanan perasaan dan mental apabila terus-terusan diganggu ‘Qarin’ Farel. Halim dimasukkan ke Hospital Mental

programme.title: Arwah Tumbal Nyai the Trilogy Part Arwah
programme.desc: Syurkiani sangat ingin tahu mengapa dia selalu dilarang oleh neneknya, Lela untuk belajar tarian jaipong. Diam-diam Syurkiani datang kepada Nyi Imas, bekas penari jaipong untuk belajar tarian. Nyi Imas meminta Syurkiani memukul gendang misteri tiga kali sebagai syarat. Bagaimanapun, Syurkiani memukul gendang sebanyak empat kali. Selepas kejadian itu nenek Syurkiani meninggal dunia kerana diserang oleh makhluk ghaib. Syurkiani juga menjadi sasaran makhluk ghaib kerana memanggil roh dengan memukul gendang sebanyak empat kali. Syukriani dan teman lelakinya, Shakti, cuba melarikan diri dari serangan itu.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep6
programme.desc: Mengisahkan encik Bad kini sedar kekasinya telah menipunya, kononnya wang RM 5,000 yang diberi pinjam untuk kos rawatan, sebaliknya kekasihnya telah menghilangkan diri. Anak dan isteri yang dicerainya telah menyindir-nyindirnya. Sementara itu Adam, Shah dan Daniel terus berusaha mencari lembaga lilin yang diharapkan encik Bad. Sementara itu Nur juga berselfie dengan Shah dan di tengah gambar mereka wujud lembaga lilin, menjadi kerisauan Nur. Nur mengadu kepada ibunya dan di samping itu Nur juga bertindak menjadi perantaraan agar ibu dan bapanya berbaik semula. Shah, Adam dan Daniel telah berbincang dengan profesor dan mendapat nasihat lanjut tentang sukarnya lembaga lilin untuk ditangkap. Di samping itu, Shah dan Adam masih berusaha memikat Nur walaupun Nur membayangkan dia menyukai Shah. Adam juga mengesyaki Shah memikat Nur tetapi masih berpura-pura. Usaha yang berterusan dengan bantuan rakan wanita Daniel, akhirnya lembaga lilin muncul dan dengan mensasarkan lilin hingga padam, akhirnya lembaga lilin berjaya ditangkap dan mengembirakan encik Bad kerana muzuimnya di kunjungi ramai

programme.title: Bodyguard S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nasha perlukan maklumat lanjut dari Ryan siapa dirinya sebenar. Ryan sebagai bodyguard kepada Dato' Amir berjaya memujuk Mak Jah berjumpa dengan Dato' Amir selepas didesak. Mak Jah memberitahu Dato' Amir bahawa Nasha sebenarnya anak mereka. Nasha akhirnya di bawa berjumpa kedua ibu bapanya. Dalam kes berasingan, Farish bodyguard Adam berjaya melepaskan Adam dari cengkaman Kumpulan Kobra. Adam akhirnya menyerahkan buku daftar senarai nama ahli Kumpulan Kobra kepada Farish. Danial, bodyguard kepada Eliza dimaklumkan bahawa Makcik Azizah adalah bekas isteri Dato' Zaidi. Ini bermakna Rashid adalah abang Eliza, mereka tidak boleh berkahwin. Eliza merajuk dan mahu meninggalkan keluarganya. Rahul pula sebagai bodyguard Maya telah dimarahi Maya kerana selalu menyebelahi Boboy. Maya masih tidak membenarkan Boboy berjumpa dengan Mikhail bekas suami Maya. Semua maklumat ini dilaporkan kepada ketuanya Nasha secara harian. Di akhir episod, ibu bapa Farish bersetuju menerima Nasha sebagai menantu mereka

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: Krew siri web seram pergi ke rumah puaka terbiar untuk siaran langsung. Mereka akan menemui sesuatu lebih daripada yang dijangkakan apabila mereka bergerak lebih dalam ke dalam bangunan lama yang mengerikan itu.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Obsesinya terhadap angkasa lepas telah membuatkan Amir untuk mencipta sebuah topi keledar. Topi keledar ini merupakan penemuan baru apabila ia menggunakan kuasa tahi bintang. Sesiapa sahaja yang memakainya boleh melihat menembusi apa sahaja yang mereka inginkan. Kekacauan berlaku apabila topi itu telah menyebabkan Amir bertukar menjadi halimunan.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Jengka
programme.desc: Nini mengalami keguguran semasa melarikan diri di ladang kelapa sawit. Namun, satu perkara aneh terjadi apabila bayinya dikatakan masih hidup dan dilarikan oleh penunggu. Orang kampung berusaha membantu mencari Nini dan anaknya, namun perkara seram terjadi sepanjang pencarian mereka.

programme.title: Femina
programme.desc: Perjuangan untuk mendapatkan hak setara antara jantina terutamanya wanita lantang dibicarakan di dalam majalah Femina. Tina, tegas memperjuangkan pendiriannya manakala Anita tidak berapa menyukai cara Tina. Femina telah menjadi satu platform anti-lelaki. Pertemuan Tina bersama Pyan mula mengubah pandangan ekstrem Tina namun perasaan dilema mula menguasai diri apabila dituduh sebagai pembelot wanita.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Jengka
programme.desc: Nini mengalami keguguran semasa melarikan diri di ladang kelapa sawit. Namun, satu perkara aneh terjadi apabila bayinya dikatakan masih hidup dan dilarikan oleh penunggu. Orang kampung berusaha membantu mencari Nini dan anaknya, namun perkara seram terjadi sepanjang pencarian mereka.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Obsesinya terhadap angkasa lepas telah membuatkan Amir untuk mencipta sebuah topi keledar. Topi keledar ini merupakan penemuan baru apabila ia menggunakan kuasa tahi bintang. Sesiapa sahaja yang memakainya boleh melihat menembusi apa sahaja yang mereka inginkan. Kekacauan berlaku apabila topi itu telah menyebabkan Amir bertukar menjadi halimunan.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Reyhan, seorang sukarelawan Muslim Care yang berasal dari Bandung jatuh hati kepada gadis Malaysia bernama Dewi sejak dia menyelamatkan Dewi daripada satu insiden ketika mereka berada di Madinah. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta Reyhan itu terhalang apabila Dewi mempunyai kekasih bernama Adam. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang gadis bernama Aliyah pula menaruh hati kepada Reyhan.

programme.title: Femina
programme.desc: Perjuangan untuk mendapatkan hak setara antara jantina terutamanya wanita lantang dibicarakan di dalam majalah Femina. Tina, tegas memperjuangkan pendiriannya manakala Anita tidak berapa menyukai cara Tina. Femina telah menjadi satu platform anti-lelaki. Pertemuan Tina bersama Pyan mula mengubah pandangan ekstrem Tina namun perasaan dilema mula menguasai diri apabila dituduh sebagai pembelot wanita.

programme.title: Baginda
programme.desc: Diwariskan untuk mengurus sebuah kolej swasta di Johor Bahru oleh pakciknya, Azian terpaksa melalui pelbagai cabaran untuk menaikkan semula martabat sekolah yang sudah merudum prestasinya itu. Hampir sahaja putus asa namun sikap dedikasinya untuk mendidik anak bangsa membuatkan Azian ingin terus menjalankan amanah pakciknya.

programme.title: Puteri Impian
programme.desc: Pekerja kilang, Puteri Nora sentiasa mengimpikan untuk menjadi seorang puteri raja. Impiannya menjadi kenyataan apabila dia diterima menyertai pertandingan "Memburu Impian". Kehidupannya berubah sekelip mata apabila bertemu Tengku Faizal, seorang putera raja. Namun, Zul, jurukameranya dalam rancangan itu turut menyukai Puteri Nora. Pilihan harus dibuat antara kemewahan atau kebebasan.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin Remaja
programme.desc: Pasangan remaja yang bakal menduduki peperiksaan SPM, Amir dan Mastura berikrar ingin berkahwin selepas tamatnya pengajian di universiti. Namun, Fandi yang juga rakan sekelas Mastura mencemburui percintaan mereka. SPM pun tiba tetapi Mastura terlewat menghadiri ujian Matematik dan berasa amat kecewa kerana menganggap dia telah pun gagal. Kakak Mastura, Anita pula ingin Mastura mencari calon suami yang kaya. Perasaan kecewa mula menyelubungi diri Amir apabila mendapat tahu Mastura ditunangkan dengan Fandi. Mengetahui perihal sebenar mengapa mereka akan dikahwinkan, Amir membawa Mastura lari ke selatan Thailand. Bermulalah kekecohan antara mereka semua dalam sekuel kepada Gila-Gila Pengantin ini.

programme.title: Azura 2012
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Reyhan, seorang sukarelawan Muslim Care yang berasal dari Bandung jatuh hati kepada gadis Malaysia bernama Dewi sejak dia menyelamatkan Dewi daripada satu insiden ketika mereka berada di Madinah. Pilihan harus dibuat antara kemewahan atau kebebasan.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Suci Dalam Debu
programme.desc: Roy adalah anak kepada orang kaya yang ingin bebas dan bergaul dengan pemuzik di kelab malam. Anak Tengku Aziz bertunang dengan Tengku Johan. Tengku Aziz menggaji Tengku Johan sebagai pengarah eksekutif syarikatnya.

programme.title: Tmo Ustaz Mu Tunggu Aku Datang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Ustaz Mu Tunggu Aku Datang

programme.title: Huru Hara Raya
programme.desc: Mengisahkan gelagat lucu sebuah keluarga di Pulau Pinang. Puan Mona dan Encik Rashid mempunyai bisnes sendiri. Puan Mona menjual biskut raya manakala Encik Rashid menjual baju tradisional atas talian. Pada masa yang sama, mereka berdua sedang sibuk membuat persiapan untuk perkahwinan anak mereka, Faizal.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: It Takes A Man And Women
programme.desc: Jalan cerita tentang seorang gadis miskin yang bekerja dengan seorang lelaki kaya di sebuah syarikat penerbitan majalah. Dia bercinta dengan lelaki tersebut namun lelaki itu telah berlaku curang kerana mementingkan diri. Gadis tersebut pergi membawa diri ke Amerika Syarikat untuk bekerja dan setelah beberapa tahun dia menjadi seorang perunding penerbitan yang berjaya dan professional. Suatu hari, syarikat lelaki tersebut mengalami masalah dan memerlukan seorang perunding penerbitan. Lembaga pengarah telah menghantar gadis itu untuk menjadi perunding bagi menyelamatkan syarikat tersebut.

programme.title: Klu
programme.desc: Tuan Hudson yang kini dalam dilema apabila perniagaannya hampir bankrap, mengambil kesempatan ini dengan memujuk Bob supaya merapatkan diri dengan Maria. Tuan Hudson mahu mengerjakan harta Datuk Nordin sekiranya Bob berjaya dijodohkan dengan Maria.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Tmo Muka Surat Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Muka Surat Cinta

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sule Pulang Haji Dapet Jodoh
programme.desc: Tindakannya sebagai ustaz media sosial ini berjaya sehingga majikannya dan rakan-rakan pejabat yang mengikuti status paparannya percaya pada tahap ilmu keagamaannya . Hubungan cintanya dengan anak majikan juga mendapat sokongan . Namun kegembiraan itu hanyalah buat seketika bila salah seorang rakan pejabatnya berasa irihati dan membuat pelbagai fitnah terhadapnya

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mentuanya, Rusman, menembaknya untuk mengelakkan lebih ramai mangsa. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: She'S Dating The Gangster
programme.desc: Athena Dizon seorang pelajar yang amat diminati oleh semua pelajar atas kademiknya, manakala Kenji de los Reyes adalah seorang gangster sekolah. kenji memberi pilihan kepada athena untuk memilih adakah mahu untuk menyamar menjadi kekasihnya untuk cemburukan bekas kekasih kenji. tetapi semakin lama perasaan antara mereka berputik.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep10
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: It Takes A Man And Women
programme.desc: Jalan cerita tentang seorang gadis miskin yang bekerja dengan seorang lelaki kaya di sebuah syarikat penerbitan majalah. Dia bercinta dengan lelaki tersebut namun lelaki itu telah berlaku curang kerana mementingkan diri. Gadis tersebut pergi membawa diri ke Amerika Syarikat untuk bekerja dan setelah beberapa tahun dia menjadi seorang perunding penerbitan yang berjaya dan professional. Suatu hari, syarikat lelaki tersebut mengalami masalah dan memerlukan seorang perunding penerbitan. Lembaga pengarah telah menghantar gadis itu untuk menjadi perunding bagi menyelamatkan syarikat tersebut.

programme.title: Tmo Muka Surat Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Muka Surat Cinta

programme.title: Jeman
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Jeman yang berusia 20an mengalami masalah lembam, ibunya meninggal dunia ketika melahirkannya.Jeman dibesarkan oleh neneknya Mak Wan. Manakala ayahnya Jalil sudah berkahwin lain.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Momzillas
programme.desc: Clara dan Minerva, dua wanita yang berkongsi lelaki yang sama, bertemu semula apabila anak lelaki dan anak perempuan masing-masing berkahwin.

programme.title: Nawfal Nak Raya
programme.desc: Raya tahun ini Nawfal perlukan baju melayu baru kerana baju yang lama sudah dipakai beberapa kali and dah tak muat. Nawfal mengajak kawan baiknya Rosyam Nor untuk mengumpul duit demi menunaikan impianya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Tmo Aku Pilih Kamu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Aku Pilih Kamu

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Untuk Angeline
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri terpaksa menyerahkan bayi perempuan mereka kepada pasangan lain kerana tidak mampu untuk membiayai kos perubatan hospital semasa bayi itu dilahirkan . Anak perempuan itu sangat disayangi oleh bapa angkatnya sehingga dicemburui oleh abang angkat dan ibu angkatnya . Namun setelah bapa angkatnya meninggal dunia, kanak-kanak perempuan itu mula dilayan dengan buruk oleh ibu angkatnya

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Milea bertemu dengan Dilan di sebuah sekolah menengah di Bandung pada tahun 1990. Perkenalan yang luar biasa membuatkan Milea mengenali keunikan Dilan yang bijak, baik dan romantik di matanya.

programme.title: Suci Dalam Debu
programme.desc: Roy adalah anak kepada orang kaya yang ingin bebas dan bergaul dengan pemuzik di kelab malam. Anak Tengku Aziz bertunang dengan Tengku Johan. Tengku Aziz menggaji Tengku Johan sebagai pengarah eksekutif syarikatnya.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep11
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Epok
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Epok yang cuba membaiki hubungan tegang antara dia dan bapanya, Pak Din, melalui sukan badminton

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Momzillas
programme.desc: Clara dan Minerva, dua wanita yang berkongsi lelaki yang sama, bertemu semula apabila anak lelaki dan anak perempuan masing-masing berkahwin.

programme.title: Tmo Aku Pilih Kamu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Aku Pilih Kamu

programme.title: Time Machine
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar dari bandar pergi meredah hutan dengan bantuan seorang pemburu muda sebagai pemandu pelancong. Kebakaran hutan memaksa mereka melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan nyawa mereka. Kumpulan itu sesat dan tersandung ke wilayah Myanmar di tengah-tengah peperangan antara tentera Myanmar dan penyamun hutan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Bibik Kayangan
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tiga beranak yang bekerja sebagai bibik di sebuah banglo milik majikannya.

programme.title: Ku Tak Percaya Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Seorang budak sekolah rendah bernama Bagong maut selepas menjadi mangsa langgar lari. Kematian Bagong menjerumuskan ibunya ke dalam kemurungan yang mendalam. Tetapi tiba-tiba Bagong kembali dengan keadaan sebenar untuk menjaga ibunya yang sangat tertekan.

programme.title: Kalau Cinta Sudah Menjadi Bubur
programme.desc: Selepas menghabiskan bubur di gerai Rahmat, Maria terus melarikan diri. Lagipun, dia kecewa kerana teman lelakinya meminta putus. Namun siapa sangka pertemuan awal yang berakhir dengan pergaduhan membuahkan cinta antara Rahmat dan Maria?

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep107
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep17
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep31
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep60
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep108

programme.title: Berkah Sedekah Bapak Pedagang Pepaya Yang Tabah
programme.desc: Danang, anak Pak Amir, menjalani kehidupan yang lebih baik. Isteri Pak Amir secara mengejut menghidap penyakit kritikal, tetapi Danang tidak mahu ibu bapanya menyusahkannya. Dia merasakan kejayaannya adalah atas usahanya seorang diri, tanpa doa ibu bapanya. Pak Amir kini ditinggalkan untuk menyara isteri dan dirinya. Adakah ketabahan Pak Amir akan membuahkan hasil?

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep7

programme.title: Aku Hanya Butuh Kata Maaf Bukan Kata Perpisahan
programme.desc: Ruli sering dipandang rendah oleh keluarga mentua kerana gaji isterinya lebih besar daripadanya. Selepas Ruli tiba-tiba berjaya kerana wanita lain, dia menjadi sombong dan membalas dendam terhadap isterinya April.

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Dengan Pembantu, Maaf Saya Khilaf
programme.desc: Sari bersedia untuk berpindah ke Jakarta menggantikan kawan baiknya, yang bekerja sebagai pengasuh nenek untuk mengumpul wang untuk bil perubatan ibunya.

programme.title: Detak Jantung di Detik Yang Berbeda
programme.desc: Jasmine yang menghidap penyakit jantung teruk sembuh dengan bantuan penderma jantung Nindy. Jasmine ingin tahu untuk mengenal pasti siapa yang menyelamatkan nyawanya, dan dia akhirnya mengetahui bahawa Nindy adalah orang yang memberikan kepadanya. Suatu hari, Dion melawat kubur Nindy dan memberitahu dia masih tidak boleh meneruskan kehidupannya dan terlalu trauma untuk menjalinkan hubungan semula. Namun, Jasmine terkilan kerana jantung Nindy berdegup kencang di dalam dirinya. Untuk membalas budi baik Nindy, Jasmine ingin menjaga Dion sebagaimana dia menjaga hatinya.

programme.title: Cintanya Salah Sambung Ke Hati Abang
programme.desc: Cindy kecewa dengan kekasihnya, Nando. Dia meminta perpisahan melalui teks dan segera menyekat nombornya untuk mengelakkan sebarang komunikasi. Cindy menyedari hubungan mereka tidak sihat sejak kebelakangan ini. Mereka bertengkar mengenai perkara kecil, seperti lewat dua minit, yang boleh menyebabkan pergaduhan besar. Bagaimanapun, dia merasakan bahawa ia tidak sepatutnya berakhir seperti ini.

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong’s dead mother returns home and tries to kill him…

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: Two co-workers navigate their feelings for each other through a minefield of office gossip and social media.

programme.title: Unbowed
programme.desc: A math professor was not re-hired for pointing out errors in the university entrance exam. Losing the lawsuit against the university, he carries his crossbow to the judge for justice.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the island’s dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a fortune teller form an unlikely partnership in order to rescue a kidnapped child before it's too late.

programme.title: Shades Of The Heart
programme.desc: Novelist who just get divorced wish to write a novel based on his life. In the process, he met people with stories about the past, memory and death. These encounters caused a change in his thoughts...

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong’s dead mother returns home and tries to kill him…

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: Remember You
programme.desc: A lawyer suffering from severe memory loss and a total change of character investigates his past and his connection to a woman he meets in a hospital.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Destiny
programme.desc: Ji-woo is still hung up on a man she fell in love in her early twenties. Her worried father has no choice but to drag her to Gi-joon, who helps people to locate their long-lost first loves.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Crazy Romance

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.title: All Reviving Ep4
programme.desc: A documentary cultural program focuses on intangible cultural heritage. Yang Lan, the Chinese media proprietor & journalist, brings us to visit the inheritors of 11 intangible cultural heritage skills with cultural successors, discovers the essence of Chinese excellent traditional culture.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep7
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: The Talent Season 2 Ep7
programme.desc: The first Gen Z competition reality show - 12 teenagers were selected to join the "Tsing Pek Summer Camp" and test their problem-solving skills. Xie Nan, Jiang Changjian, and Wei Kunlin (Dr. Wei) were formed as a guardian group, together with Ding Ruoxu, Leo Li, Jay Song, etc. who jointly escort the players on the "Ling-guang Island Tour".

programme.title: The Delicacy Ep8
programme.desc: Representatives in various fields are invited to submit creative recipes; top chefs fight for the interesting one and cook accordingly. Allen Lin, Meng Mei Qi, and David Wang gather as the judges to select and add the outstanding dishes in to the menu of winners.

programme.title: Bestie Day Ep1
programme.desc: Some female stars, such as Ada Liu, Loura Lou, Jiang Meng Jie, Mao Xiao Tong, Karlina Zhang, and Zhou Jie Qiong, would invite their besties to reunite and record their sweet time for 24 hours.

programme.title: Great Dance Crew Season 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Dance survival show which gathered professional dancers and trainees audition to become part of the final dance crew. Focusing on the new genre, in addition to the return of "Old Veterans" Santa Uno and Cheng Xiao, Rainie Yang, Jessica Jung, Kido Gao, Sdanny Lee were invited as mentors. Total 6 brand-new-star groups joined forces to fight for dignity to the end, and competed for the honor.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep130
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10671068
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46104611
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2032
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3600
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep153
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46114612
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2033
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3601
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46124613
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10711072
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1040

programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1040
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep53
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep205206
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep445
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on LIVE!(M) Ep32
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his “wife” comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters’ best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: Some believe that the world is one of many; that our existence is merely an intersection between countless dimensions - known and unknown. We run into strangers we don't see, hum to tunes we don't hear. Most of us remain ignorant, but there are always others who would try everything to beseech the truth if not the thrill - that is, to see ghosts just for the sake of living once. Five teenage thrill-seekers embark on the journey to explore the lurid landscape of the other-world. Oblivious to the underlying principal of the "10", their morbid appetite for fear is to be met with, and only too excessively... Following their quintessential horror sensations The Eye and The Eye 2, Pang Brothers have yet conceived an electrifying young breed of the series - The Eye 10 - a nightmarish rollercoaster ride that sees no end...

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma’s pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief’s daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brother’s death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong’s younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles…

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Constantly being abused by her cruel husband, the frail Chan Sau Ying awaits death from tuberculosis. The new servant girl Yi Wah, takes pity on her mistress’ plight and the pair proceed to drown him one evening. They dump his body in a nearby pond but Sau Ying believes that the man’s bloated corpse has risen from the bog to seek vengeance.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent’s son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan’s elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen’s brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen’s home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: A heroic family is double crossed and massacred on the battle field with only two of the brothers surviving the slaughter. One of the brothers (Gordon Liu), escapes to a Shaolin temple where his bloodlust and thirst for vengeance puts him at odds with the monks. When he discovers his sister is captured by the same villains who destroyed his family he leaves the monastery in an attempt to rescue her and avenge what has come upon his family.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife, and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou’s brother Xiao Lou knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge on Fung and his sister-in-law.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and you’ve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain (Wang Lung-wei), and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and you’ve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case…

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

Then at a thrift store, Michael taps into his musical abilities by turning into a human record player. Plus, as an employee at a shipping store, he astonishingly flips a full bowl of punch without spilling a drop and repeatedly teleports a glass penguin to one customer's dismay.

programme.title: The Flash S7 12
programme.desc: When Cisco and Kamilla tell the team they are leaving Central City, Barry, Iris and Caitlin enlist them one final time to deal with Rainbow Raider.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 01
programme.desc: In the series premiere, ex-Navy SEAL Martin Riggs (CLAYNE CRAWFORD) is paired up with by-the-book LAPD detective Roger Murtaugh (DAMON WAYANS) in a partnership that could be lethal.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S1 13
programme.desc: As the Injustice Society of America come closer to accomplishing their mission, Courtney and the JSA face off against Icicle and the villains of the ISA in the season one finale.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 12
programme.desc: While Lois and John Henry Irons try to find the best way to stop Morgan Edge, Jonathan encourages Jordan to focus on strengthening his powers to help locate their dad.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 13
programme.desc: Superman pays a visit to Morgan Edge. Meanwhile, Lois and Chrissy work together on a story. Lastly, Jonathan finds a welcome distraction during a very stressful school day.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 14
programme.desc: Lois is worried about Jordan as he and Sarah continue to grow closer. Meanwhile, Clark pays Lana a visit. Lastly, Jonathan has been spending more and more time with John Henry.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 15
programme.desc: In the first season finale, Superman’s worst nightmare comes to life, and Lois confronts Leslie Larr (STACEY FARBER). Meanwhile, Lana, Kyle and Sarah stay to help General Lane.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 01
programme.desc: In the series premiere, ex-Navy SEAL Martin Riggs (CLAYNE CRAWFORD) is paired up with by-the-book LAPD detective Roger Murtaugh (DAMON WAYANS) in a partnership that could be lethal.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 11
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Joe and Murr act as not-so-handy-men, helping strangers assemble furniture. The guys pair up for a panty drop at the mall, and Thanksgiving comes early for the loser when he's forced to talk turkey at a dating event.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 12
programme.desc: It's hats off for Murr, Sal, Q and Joe when they work as cap salesmen. Then, the guys head to Joey Fatone's hot dog joint to serve confused customers. And the loser performs a stand-up comedy routine but barely gets out alive.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: The guys head to Orlando, where they are out of line with theme park guests, get wet on a river adventure and manage the (mis)information booth. Plus, the loser goes from spider hero to barnyard zero.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q say aloha in a fun Hawaiian episode! The future looks hazy when the guys pose as fortune tellers and practice indecent proposals at a romantic waterfall. Plus, it's blood in the water for the big loser.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 15
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q put the nasty in "namaste" when they lead guided meditations that leave their victims with a lot to think about. And the big loser gets boxed in with the very first 24-hour punishment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 02
programme.desc: Leonard's job is at stake when he gives an embarrassing radio interview which angers the university and the entire physics community. NPR Host IRA FLATOW returns as himself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 03
programme.desc: Amy records Sheldon talking in his sleep and tries to convince him he can be more easygoing. Meanwhile Raj and Stuart compete to win the heart of Bernadette's coworker.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 04
programme.desc: While Howard and Sheldon bond over their relationships with their disappointing fathers Leonard's mom (CHRISTINE BARANSKI) finds a new best friend in Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 05
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny learn new tactics for dealing with Sheldon from an unlikely source. Meanwhile, Raj & Sheldon can't handle Amy working together with Howard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 06
programme.desc: Sheldon goes up against WIL WHEATON for the role of the new Professor Proton, while Penny steps in to take care of Halley when Bernadette & Howard are laid up on bed rest.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 11
programme.desc: As Courtney, Sylvester and the JSA plot to take down a major threat, the arrival of someone from their past sends shock waves through the town.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 6
programme.desc: At a sporting goods store, a confused customer debates the laws of physics with Michael after he suddenly makes a lightweight box impossibly heavy. Then as a barista, Michael shows caf� patrons that glass is not nearly as impenetrable as it seems. Plus, he spooks museum workers when he shows that boomerangs really do always come back, and that taxidermy is a less than permanent solution.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 7
programme.desc: In a Mexican restaurant, Michael treats incredulous diners to a good luck serpent with their tableside guacamole, and makes salsa so spicy it melts metal. Then, he confuses office coworkers with a never-ending brown bag lunch and a frozen meal thatturns out to be alarmingly fresh. Plus, he confounds his new assistant with some tricks of the trade as a real estate agent, including freshening dead flowers right before her eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 8
programme.desc: Michael mystifies laundromat patrons by impossibly multiplying miniscule amounts of detergent, and makes one man's day when he convinces him that he's hit the coin machine jackpot. Then at a thrift store, Michael taps into his musical abilities by turning into a human record player. programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: Sonny is a 32-year old man who has avoided any responsibility. But when his girlfriend leaves him for an older man, Sonny looks for a way to prove his maturity, and decides to become a dad.

programme.desc: Captain Yenko’s connection to a witness could be instrumental in locating a missing child.
