programme.title: The Winds Of War Ep01
programme.desc: The Winds Rise-The year is 1939 and Adolf Hitler is meeting with his staff to begin the nightmare that wil become World War II.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep20
programme.desc: Sons and Bowlers-A neighboring Marine unit has been challenging the 4077th to a variety of sporting matches — and beating the medical team at everything — until Potter suggests a bowling match. Despite enlisting a tutorial from a pro bowler, the Marines are finally defeated by the M*A*S*H team. Hawkeye places a call to his dad after finding out his father needs surgery, and manages to tell his father that he loves him. Charles is surprisingly supportive of Hawkeye during this troubled time.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep19
programme.desc: Dancin' Angels-A dance marathon with $5,000 in prize money attracts Joe and Sally Fairgate to compete, but when Sally disappears, Joe enlists the Angels' help in finding her.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep13
programme.desc: Lucy, the Fight Manager-Lucy Carmichael turns fight manager after she fails to talk Mr. Mooney into loaning $3000 to an ex-pug named Eddie Rickles.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Up Captain Peacock-After 20 years of service at Grace Brothers, Captain Peacock is congratulated with a honorary medal. He has also been granted the key to the executive washroom and a seat in the executive dining room.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep19
programme.desc: The Last Summer-When young Jason Carter accepts his first job as an assistant to an aging woman in Walnut Grove, he just wants to earn some money and buy his mother a birthday gift.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep20
programme.desc: For The Love Of Blanche-On his way back from Sleepy Eye, Isaiah Edwards meets up with a dying old man, whose last request is for Isaiah to take care of his 3-year-old Blanche.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Vinnie's Blind Date-Upset that Janine never kisses him at the movies when everyone else is necking, Vinnie decides that their relationship is over. He has decided to choose a life of total and complete celibacy.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep13
programme.desc: King of the Hill-A young Marine veteran suffers a psychotic breakdown, which causes him to believe he is back in the battle zone in Vietnam. When Danny Williams tries to assist him, Austin holds him prisoner in a hospital ward.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep20
programme.desc: Sons and Bowlers-A neighboring Marine unit has been challenging the 4077th to a variety of sporting matches — and beating the medical team at everything — until Potter suggests a bowling match. Despite enlisting a tutorial from a pro bowler, the Marines are finally defeated by the M*A*S*H team. Hawkeye places a call to his dad after finding out his father needs surgery, and manages to tell his father that he loves him. Charles is surprisingly supportive of Hawkeye during this troubled time.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Twitch or Treat-Darrin is incensed when Endora makes a house appear near the Stephens home for a Halloween party. When Samantha begs her mother to remove the house, Endora decides to hold her party in the Stephens home.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Dangerous Diaper Dan-Diaper Dan, secretly working for the A.J. Kimberly Adver-tising Agency, gives Samantha a baby rattle. Samantha, proud of Darrin's creative ability, describes his ad campaigns to Endora.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep14
programme.desc: Lucy Meets Sheldon Leonard-Popular movie gangster turned TV producer Sheldon Leonard (playing himself) gets permission from Mr. Mooney to film a scene for a TV pilot in the bank after working hours.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep21
programme.desc: Picture This-Potter wants a picture of the entire M*A*S*H unit as a gift for Mildred’s birthday and is pleased with the simplicity of his idea. However, Hawkeye refuses to pose for the picture with Charles and B.J. due to a rift between the men that has led Hawkeye to move out of The Swamp and seek his own quarters. It takes some serious meddling but Mulcahy, Klinger and Hot Lips are able to negotiate a truce, Hawkeye returns to the swamp, and Mildred gets her photo in the end.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Uptight-The death of a young girl while under the influence of drugs leads to Five-O tracking down the supplier, who turns out to be a self-styled guru who is headmaster to a large cult of hippies.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep20
programme.desc: Harrigan's Angel-When Starrett Electronics is the victim of a second large heist, Paul Starrett's insurance company insists he have additional help for Joseph Harrigan, a bumbling, disheveled private investigator covering the case.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Cold Store-Mr Lucas has a girl coming to visit him, so he tries to pretend he has a cold to get the day off work. Captain Peacock gets Sister to check his temperature, which says he is perfectly normal. Mrs Slocombe does have a cold but refuses to go home.

programme.title: Baywatch S9 Ep18

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Uptight-The death of a young girl while under the influence of drugs leads to Five-O tracking down the supplier, who turns out to be a self-styled guru who is headmaster to a large cult of hippies.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Twitch or Treat-Darrin is incensed when Endora makes a house appear near the Stephens home for a Halloween party. When Samantha begs her mother to remove the house, Endora decides to hold her party in the Stephens home.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Dangerous Diaper Dan-Diaper Dan, secretly working for the A.J. Kimberly Adver-tising Agency, gives Samantha a baby rattle. Samantha, proud of Darrin's creative ability, describes his ad campaigns to Endora.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep19
programme.desc: The Last Summer-When young Jason Carter accepts his first job as an assistant to an aging woman in Walnut Grove, he just wants to earn some money and buy his mother a birthday gift.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep20
programme.desc: For The Love Of Blanche-On his way back from Sleepy Eye, Isaiah Edwards meets up with a dying old man, whose last request is for Isaiah to take care of his 3-year-old Blanche.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Vinnie's Blind Date-Upset that Janine never kisses him at the movies when everyone else is necking, Vinnie decides that their relationship is over. He has decided to choose a life of total and complete celibacy.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep21
programme.desc: Picture This-Potter wants a picture of the entire M*A*S*H unit as a gift for Mildred’s birthday and is pleased with the simplicity of his idea. However, Hawkeye refuses to pose for the picture with Charles and B.J. due to a rift between the men that has led Hawkeye to move out of The Swamp and seek his own quarters. It takes some serious meddling but Mulcahy, Klinger and Hot Lips are able to negotiate a truce, Hawkeye returns to the swamp, and Mildred gets her photo in the end.

programme.desc: Hello And Goodbye-Mr. Montague, a renowned author who is undergoing research for his next book, moves in with Laura and Almanzo at their newly implemented boarding house.

programme.desc: And the Winner Is...-Doogie and McGuire are arguing about who is the better doctor and who is always ordering whom around, until they find out both are supposedly in line for the hospital’s coveted “Resident of the Year” Award.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep09
programme.desc: The Short, Happy Circuit of Aunt Clara-The Stephens are invited to the Tate home to meet a client who manufactures shoes. Darrin agrees to let Aunt Clare babysit when Samantha tells him Aunt Clara is sad because she has lost her boy friend

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep10
programme.desc: I'd Rather Twitch Than Fight-Darrin is furious when Samantha gives his checked sport jacket, bought before he was married, away. Meanwhile, Louise, lectures Samantha on the importance of clothing and the gifts married couples exchange.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Married... With Children-Peggy forces Al to sacrifice a basketball game and spend a torturous evening in conversation with new neighbors, idealistic newlyweds Steve and Marcy Rhoades.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep22
programme.desc: That Darn Kid-A goat eats $22,000 in payroll cash while Hawkeye is paymaster and I-Corps is holding an in investigation. The I-Corps investigator, Major Van Zandt, determines the goat story implausible and says Hawkeye is responsible and must repay the money. After it is arranged that the goat in question eats Van Zandt’s report, Van Zandt sees things differently and Hawkeye is released from his obligation. While everyone else is concerned with the goat and the payroll, Charles is more concerned with the money he borrowed from Rizzo to buy a vase which turned out to be worthless. Rizzo charges %100 interest per day.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Face of the Dragon-McGarrett and his team of police experts go into action when a man who is carrying the bubonic plague turns up in the Hawaiian Islands and the plans for a top-secret military weapon disappear. To thwart a possible epidemic, McGarrett must find the carrier of the plague.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep21
programme.desc: An Angel's Trail-Jill Munroe is taken hostage when she accidentally stumbles into a gas station robbery. Convict Sam Mason and his sons escape into the desolate desert hills keeping Jill tied in the back of their getaway van.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep05
programme.desc: German Week-The ladies and gents are selling German goods but neither the staff nor the customers are warming up to the lederhosen. In order to boost the German spirit, the floor gets out some German wine and dresses up for a folk dance.

programme.title: Baywatch S9 Ep19
programme.desc: Double Jeopardy-Alex tries to save a diamond runner whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Meanwhile, Neely gives Hobie an offer that divides the Buchannon house.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep15
programme.desc: Once Upon A Time-After substituting for Etta Plum at Walnut Grove’s school, Laura realizes that being a housewife is not enough for her restless spirit.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep16
programme.desc: Home Again Part 1-Charles is forced to address Albert’s recent criminal behavior. The two of them take a trip back to Walnut Grove, and Charles is hopeful that the experience will straighten out his son.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep17
programme.desc: Home Again Part 2-Charles is forced to address Albert’s recent criminal behavior. The two of them take a trip back to Walnut Grove, and Charles is hopeful that the experience will straighten out his son.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep18
programme.desc: A Child With No Name-With the birth of a beautiful baby boy in the spring, it appears that Laura and Almanzo’s family is now complete.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep01
programme.desc: The Hand of Fate-Mr Humphries' palm reading skills are put to the test when Mr Rumbold's position becomes available and Captain Peacock, Mrs Slocomb and Mr Grainger compete over his position.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Coffee Morning-Captain Peacock complains when he notices the staff are taking leisurely coffee breaks. Management then orders for a timekeeping book in which the staff will 'clock in and clock out' when they go for breaks.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Up Captain Peacock-After 20 years of service at Grace Brothers, Captain Peacock is congratulated with a honorary medal. He has also been granted the key to the executive washroom and a seat in the executive dining room.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Cold Store-Mr Lucas has a girl coming to visit him, so he tries to pretend he has a cold to get the day off work. Captain Peacock gets Sister to check his temperature, which says he is perfectly normal. Mrs Slocombe does have a cold but refuses to go home.

programme.title: Baywatch S9 Ep15
programme.desc: Baywatch Grand Prix-Mitch gets the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon visits for a major competition. Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards.

programme.title: Baywatch S9 Ep16
programme.desc: Baywatch Down Under Part I-After the ex-wife of a lifeguard dies, Mitch and the gang join him on a trip to Australia, where he's to meet the son he never knew.

programme.title: Baywatch S9 Ep17
programme.desc: Baywatch Down Under Part II-While the Baywatchers prepare for their race against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Nobody's Perfect-After Dr. Koblin reports that Tabitha is a perfectly normal baby, Samantha sees a toy pony floating in the air to Tabitha when she wiggles her fingers, and realizes that the baby has inherited her witchcraft.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep02
programme.desc: The Moment of Truth-Samantha still hasn't found the courage to tell Darrin Tabitha is a witch. When the baby, using her witchcraft, turns the living room into a mess, Aunt Clara is sure her own failing powers are responsible.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Witches and Warlocks Are My Favorite Things-Endora tells Samantha that her aunts are coming to the Stephens' home to test Tabitha's powers of witchcraft. During the test, Tabitha thrills her great-aunts with the display of her powers.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Accidental Twins-Aunt Clara baby-sits with Tabitha Stephens and Timothy Tate when their parents go to the theatre. She entertains the babies with magic. Peeping through the window, Gladys Kravitz is completely befuddled.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep05
programme.desc: A Most Unusual Wood Nymph-Gerry O'Toole, a beautiful Irish girl who is a friend of Darrin's aunt arrives for a visit and announces she plans to stay with the Stephens until she gets a job.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep17
programme.desc: Catch A Falling Angel-Tennessean Seth Jeffers follows his girlfriend, Bess Murdock, to Los Angeles. But when Seth disappears, the Angels are called to investigate.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep18
programme.desc: Homes, Sweet Homes-When a wealthy Beverly Hills couple is robbed of valuable Egyptian art treasures, the Angels suspect the dapper real estate baron, Barry Kingsbrook. Kris infiltrates the Kingsbrook Agency as an agent.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep19
programme.desc: Dancin' Angels-A dance marathon with $5,000 in prize money attracts Joe and Sally Fairgate to compete, but when Sally disappears, Joe enlists the Angels' help in finding her.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep18
programme.desc: Promotion Commotion-Hawkeye, B.J. and Charles are given the assignment of deciding the promotions of the enlisted men and immediately have to fend of pleas and bribes. Charles is even threatened with violence by an ambitious Corporal Hitalski. When Klinger is promoted to Sergeant he sets up Hitalski’s arrest. Later Potter befriends a soldier who is ostracized for sticking to his moral code of ethics.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Heroes-The 4077th becomes a media circus when the middle-weight boxing champ has a stroke while at the M*A*S*H unit on a publicity junket. Hawkeye becomes the center of the media pummeling when the boxer dies while under his care. Meanwhile, B.J. invents a new medical electroshock technique while trying to save the life of a patient. The patient lives but the press ignores the story in favor of the weightier news of the death of the champ.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep20
programme.desc: Sons and Bowlers-A neighboring Marine unit has been challenging the 4077th to a variety of sporting matches — and beating the medical team at everything — until Potter suggests a bowling match. Despite enlisting a tutorial from a pro bowler, the Marines are finally defeated by the M*A*S*H team. Hawkeye places a call to his dad after finding out his father needs surgery, and manages to tell his father that he loves him. Charles is surprisingly supportive of Hawkeye during this troubled time.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep2
programme.desc: Meet The Competition - A second group of bakers is challenged to scour the kitchen to figure out what has been baked.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep3
programme.desc: Just Desserts - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short heads home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep4
programme.desc: Decisions, Decisions - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives will move forward in the competition and the duo that falls short will head home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep5
programme.desc: Rock And Roll - The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short heads home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep6
programme.desc: Red, White And Clue - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short will head home, guest judge Aarón Sánchez.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep7
programme.desc: The Rise And Fall - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep8
programme.desc: Fight Until The Batter End - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best detectives continue on in the competition.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill
programme.desc: A brutal and realistic war film focuses on the lives of a squad of 14 U.S. Army soldiers in the battle for Hill 937 in the A Shau Valley of Vietnam.

programme.title: Steel Sharks

programme.title: Big Cats: The Science of
programme.desc: Scientists are constantly making discoveries that reveal new insights into big cat behaviour and physiology. This programme explores big cats ranging from cheetahs to Andean mountain cats.

programme.desc: In Hong Kong, an old WW2 detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep8
programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Galapagos - Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Electric Car - Hannah Fry discovers why innovations in meat packing almost derailed the electric car revolution and how a breakthrough in camcorder batteries led to Elon Musk's electric empire.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creatures Great and Small - See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four-ton elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Social Animals - Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart; two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cocos Island - Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Rica’s national parks. Aboard the Undersea Hunter, we’ll explore the area’s hammerhead and Galapagos sharks, rays, and other large marine species that populate these deep waters.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creatures Great and Small - See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four-ton elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart; two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ancient Lineages - Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Surrogate Families - Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals we’ll meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Herd Mentality - Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore what’s it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan Monkey on a Mission - Rajan is the powerful alpha male who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain such a big group, but the future doesn’t look so bright. There are more mouths to feed, and yet his jungle home is shrinking.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Socorro Islands - A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Catch Me if You Can - Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Home Away from Home - Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Endangered Species - With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Joined at the Hip - The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Cold Blood - It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia there’s a different story – this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life and Death in the Dunes - The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, but the animals here are resilient and specialized. Even for the hardiest inhabitants, death’s never far away. Creatures must seize every opportunity to find food, shelter and water. Adaptability is the key to dune survival.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Weird Wonders of the Wadi - A wadi is a waterhole, a rare place in the desert where hard bedrock traps the tiniest traces of water. A vital valley visited by the creepy and bizarre. All animals must come here to drink, something predators are quick to exploit; venomous vipers, glowing scorpions and stalking tarantulas hide in the crevices, ever ready to strike.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Aerial Masters - The Arabian Peninsula is the world’s transit hub for three billion birds on migration to and from Europe, Africa and Asia. This episode tells the stories of the majestic raptors and magnificent waders, from the largest migrants to the smaller residents, and how they fly, hunt and survive in this region of extremes - both in the wild desert and close to the urban jungle.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A New Zealand Christmas - See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Osprey: Sea Raptor - A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story 1 Ep1
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the world’s 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are nature’s best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hollow Heart - This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years… that can withstand the harshest conditions… and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any other…the enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: A New Diverse Cuisine - Rachel visits Malmo, and the multicultural feel of the city gives her inspiration to make a Swedish green shakshuka. For dessert, Rachel prepares very tasty chocolate oat cookies.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show (S30) Ep6
programme.desc: Graham is joined by Paul Mescal, Michaela Coel, Winston Duke, Emma Corrin and Richard Ayoade. Music comes from Loyle Carner.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S7) Ep15
programme.desc: It's the grand final and the bakers create ice cream sandwiches and dessert jars, followed by the ultimate Showstopper - a finale funfair cake. Who will be crowned the winner?

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: In Suffolk, Emma and Nick help Pete and Louise who are struggling to work from home and deal with the needs of their two kids. Can the team create some much-needed individual space for the family?

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Spice - Today the remaining bakers are working with spices.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Curry Night - Jamie creates a vegetarian feast with an array of fragrant dishes, including a coconut squash curry, beautifully fried golden paneer and a smoky aubergine dal, finished off with minted mango fro-yos.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep9
programme.desc: Mayor of Shreveport - Adrian Perkins, Mayor of Shreveport, La., feels the heat undercover as he faces literal fires and hard truths while being trained by city employees within the fire and police departments, the park maintenance team, and at a youth recreation center.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Spice - Today the remaining bakers are working with spices.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: The Brando, French Polynesia - Giles and Monica fly to the other side of the world to work in one of the world's most luxurious eco resorts on the small island of Tetiaroa in French Polynesia, not too far from Monica's birthplace - Samoa.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Rick discovers an unusual superstition and a rare type of Norman castle in Launceston, before meeting musicians Graham Fitkin and Ruth Wall in the far west of Cornwall.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4) Ep8
programme.desc: Hybrid - The bakers mix things up to create a fusion of things that aren't quite what they seem.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Finals - The teams pour all of their patisserie passion and prowess into creating chocolate hats and a banquet fit for an awards ceremony. Who will be crowned the winner?

programme.desc: Hidden Retreats - Some truly remarkable and hidden retreats in Canada, Iceland, Sweden and the UK.

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen (S1) Ep7

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2021

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep30
programme.desc: 127 Owwws / 28 Fleas Later - Eep and Thunk become obsessed with a new trend known as “quicktogramming”/Grug accidentally causes the first outbreak of a “super bug”

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep29
programme.desc: Bad Lot-tentant / Jet Fetters - Lotta takes a personality quiz and learns she's supposed to be evil. Tiny and Lucretia offer to get the girls' costumes for the Horn-A-Corn convention.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep29
programme.desc: Agent Ace/Smoove As Ice - Chet can't get him on a cereal box, so Turbo makes Ace Gecko his sports agent; Smoove Move competes in a ski race to prove his worth -- all for love.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep19
programme.desc: House Touchers/The Transformation - When Rocksy is accidentally flung inside the humans' house, Berry and Twig go on a wild adventure to bring her back. / Rocksy is upset when she finds out all her friends will evolve, but she will always be a pebble. Rocksy tries various attempts to challenge her nature.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep77
programme.desc: King Of Dragons, Part 1 - The riders think they have discovered the King of Dragons but quickly learn along with the Flyers that the real King of the Dragons lives under Berserker Island

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep78
programme.desc: King Of Dragons, Part 2 - The riders battle the Flyers at Berserker Island while Hiccup and Dagur search the caves and find a Bewilderbeast egg

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep25
programme.desc: Coronation of the Iron Goddess - When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep26
programme.desc: The Invincible Armour - Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep19
programme.desc: House Touchers/The Transformation - When Rocksy is accidentally flung inside the humans' house, Berry and Twig go on a wild adventure to bring her back. / Rocksy is upset when she finds out all her friends will evolve, but she will always be a pebble. Rocksy tries various attempts to challenge her nature.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep49
programme.desc: The Case Of The Diabolo - Noddy's delighted to be given a diabolo by Big Ears. But when Noddy tries it out for the first time, the diabolo crashes and breaks in two. Even worse, when Noddy goes to retrieve the two halves, he finds that they're both missing! Noddy needs to investigate. Where is his new toy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep50
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Trophy - Queen Sparklewings invites the toys to play a game of Catch the Flag at the castle. But when the special trophy goes missing, Noddy has to investigate. Where is the vanished trophy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep51
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Cows - When Train hears cows near the railway tracks, he's worried that he might scare them and he insists on going really slow. Trouble is there's a load of Builders on board who need to get to Brickabuild fast. Noddy decides to investigate. Where are the lost cows?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep52
programme.desc: The Case Of The Burst Tyres - There's a race at the loop-the-loop. Deltoid brings the prize for the winner: a beautiful model of the loop the loop circuit made by Pat Pat and Smartysaurus. All the toys are very excited, but before the race starts the tyres of Deltoid's tribike are burst! Could it be one of the contestants trying to prevent him from winning the race? Noddy needs to find out so that the race can take place.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa And Poorly Pia - Pia has hurt her wing and cant fly around or play so Raa Raa tries to find a way to cheer her up.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep24

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Night Noises - Raa Raa and his friends get lost in the dark while out looking for fireflies but Raa Raa guides the way back home.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa Plays Do What I Do - Raa Raa is playing a new game called Do What I Do with his friends but a misunderstanding upsets Topsy.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep49

But Murray has other ideas… he admits he has always dreamed of racing himself. An unlikely candidate makes his dreams come true!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep50
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Heroes - Mr Carburettor's cousin Chubby is coming to Silver hatch as he wants to film his new blockbuster there. Everybody goes all out to prove that it is just the right location for Chubby's new film

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep51
programme.desc: Pc Roary - Roary helps PC Pete keep the track safe on a snowy day.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep52

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep25
programme.desc: The Reflesherator / Master Blister - The Reflesherator When Professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers for the job. Master Blister The students of Scare School are thrilled after a prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep26
programme.desc: Casper The Match Maker / Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher - Casper, the Match Maker When Frankengymteacher gets extra crabby, the kids realize he's secretly in love with their history teacher, Hedy. Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher On “take your kid to work day,” Jimmy's dad invites him to tag along as a junior ghost catcher.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep56
programme.desc: My Fair Demon - When a kind, gentle Demon with dreams of being evil emerges from the portal, Puss and the team do their best to teach the monster how to be bad

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep10
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck / Bonestand and Deliver - Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep19
programme.desc: The Case Of Bling's Hidden Present - It's Bling's birthday and she is so excited that she keeps opening all her presents before her party. Noddy needs to make sure she doesn't open the storybook present from him and Big Ears early – but he's got to find it first! Big Ears has hidden it and can't remember where he's put it! Noddy launches his investigation to find the missing present before Bling does. Using his investigating skills Noddy follows the clues all over Toyland to find the present before the impatient little Naughticorn. At her birthday party Bling is thrilled to open the present from Noddy and Big Ears. She does have a present to open at her party after all! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep20
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Wall Of Bricks - Fuse has a new electronic ball. Noddy suggests that they invite everyone to play with it later. Fuse agrees but when Noddy returns with the other toys there is a big brick wall in front of the workshop. No one can get in and there's no sign of Fuse! Noddy uses all his investigating skills to follow the clues. He discovers that Fuse built the brick wall to stop his friends coming into the workshop because he was worried his new electronic ball might get broken. Noddy helps him feel comfortable with sharing his toy ball after all the other toys promise to be super careful with it. Now everyone can play together! Yay for Noddy!
